name: Ojamu
description: Built to be interoperable across leading Blockchains, Ethereum, Polygon and Polkadot. Ojamu automates and optimizes digital marketing campaigns across any industry vertical, utilizing ‘real-time' data, Ai and Blockchain technology, enabling Brands to reach their marketing goals with data-driven predictions and recommendations across all digital channels via the Ojamu NFT Access Pass. Ojamu analyzes hundreds of millions of data points to provide automated digital campaign recommendations with the highest probability of success. The Ojamu Ai is trained to connect with NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), making them an access point for not only an industry vertical's key data, but cross-correlating previously unexplored data points that reveal unknown data clusters, unlocking new areas of opportunity for Brands to reach and continuously engage with their target audiences across the globe. Powered by Ojamu’s proprietary Neural Predictive Engine and a suite of intelligent toolsets, the Ojamu Intelligent Platform (OIP) solves antiquated manual marketing and data collection/analysis methods to help Brands connect with their target audiences and achieve product-market fit.
